conditions: facts.infrastructure_type = 'virtual' and facts.infrastructure_vendor = 'kvm' and facts.os_release > 8 and facts.kernel_modules contains ['cirrus']
description: With a future major update of Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 (RHEL8), the Cirrus VGA GPU device will no longer be supported in KVM virtual machines. Therefore, Red Hat recommends using the stdvga, virtio-vga, or qxl devices instead of Cirrus VGA.
name: Ensure Cirrus VGA virtual GPU type is not used on Virtual Machines (deprecated)
